summary: new armor,that based on Skyrim mythology
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]
[b]
Updated(v 1.1):

1.Improve some bugs
2.Add new axe model(Wuuthrad Reborne).More detailed,more intresting

Update(v 1.2)

1.Update .esp file
2.New axe no more replace Wuuthrad(can now be found in the same chest as armor)
3.Armor added to Ysgramor in Sovngarde
4.Add optional Low Res textures
[/b]
[/color]

Finally,i'm finish this armor,woo - ha,this was hard work,especially textures.So download and enjoy
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Armor created only for male character(may be later create this armor for females),helmet not support beast races
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
French translation

[/url]

Special thanks to Nightskia for screenshots and logo
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Location:

Ysgramor tomb(chest near the statue)
--------------------------------------------------------

Tools used:

3d max 2009
Autodesk Mudbox 2012
Unfold 3d
NifScope
Creation Kit
----------------------------------

Have fun and enjoy ;)
